page.title: 16Kington :A Farm Day
page.content: {I Live on a Farm I woke up at 7.30am and went and had a wash. I put on my blue jeans, my pink sweat-shirt and my white ankle socks, then went downstairs and grabbed a bourbon biscuit. I put my trainers on and went to feed my animals. I've got five calves called Dolly, Dewdrop, Tilly, Billy and Willy, two heifers called Shona and Donna, and a cow who was being milked by Dad who had 72 cows to milk by machine. I went in and had my breakfast which consisted of Special K, fish fingers on fried bread and two cups of tea. After breakfast Joanne and Andrew went to play in their den and Mum did some cooking. I went outside, called the two dogs Lucy and Scottie and went to feed our baby ducks. They were all outside swimming and making a noise. I looked at my watch. {(cont on next page)
